vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.26.34; married to Anah (H6034);
father of: Judith (H3067)
§ Beeri = "my well"
1) Esau's Hittite father-in-law
2) father of Hosea
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   padre de Judit, esposa de Esaú; (b)   padre del profeta Oseas
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
備利 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "我的井"
1) 以掃的岳父, 猶滴的父親比利( #創 26:34)
2) 何西阿的父親( #何 1:1| )
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
备利 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "我的井"
1) 以扫的岳父, 犹滴的父亲比利( #创 26:34)
2) 何西阿的父亲( #何 1:1| )

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Hos.1.1;
father of: Hosea (H1954J)
§ Beeri = "my well"
1) Esau's Hittite father-in-law
2) father of Hosea
